Memorable moments of Freshman year bad and good- not in chronological order

-wearing the same clothes for 1 month straight
-nearly getting arrested for weed possesion
-getting 20 hours community service and a $50 fine
-asking my CORE teacher out on a date
-going to barbados for new years
-wrestling Max drunk on the beach in cancun (when he was sober)
-smoking jim up for the first time (hell yea)
-breaking up with my first love
-watching team america with the bros
-a girl farting in Jim and Dany's room while we were all there
-wrestling max and absolutely destroying the room
-slamming jim on the ground when over reacting
-me and dany seeing the girl bite it so bad on the tredmill
-danny calling the RA on max and I and then us blasting thuderstruck at an obscene volume in retaliiation
-pulling out jim's chest hair
-Frebreeze battle with me Jim and Max
-seeing Lewis Black at VCU  fuckin hilarious
-first random hook up ever
-gerard rolling down the hill drunk as hell
-sneaking home when my parents went away and getting away with it (and having some good adventures while there)
-hot tub underwater adventure(wink)
-max and i making fun of girls that could hear us right outside our door and having them knock on our door and tell us they could hear everything we were saying
-dressing up as harry potter for halloween
-trigun in the beginning of the year (helsing too)
-team america soccer and me getting my shirt ripped and scoring a hat trick
-playing kings(the best drinking game) in cancun
-telling ghost stories late at night and james sleeping in the same bed as danny because he got scared
-moose knuckle soccer in the beginning of the year
-lucy won trying to make out with me and me not even noticing
-getting in my car accident (god that sucked)
-finding out kim was a stripper (and being able to claim one of my ex girlfriends is a stripper)
-keeping the entire hall up with hilarious late night conversations with max

-getting sexiled(3 times)

-adam taking me to a burger joint while smoking a jay and driving at the same time
-jim doing the robot at the 80s dance
-jim saying pound the rock when he was fucked up
-max doing his thriller dance at 80s dance
-jim thrift shopping for womens clothes
-mudslidding in the hurricane
-max taking 15 shots and still setting the alarm right (whereas i completely sober and fucked it up)
-jim putting his pubes on his suitemates toothbrushes
-when the lunch lady yelled at jim
-marcos taking the febreeze shot
-pizza eating contest between max and jim (max winning)
-when jim got left out of his share of the pizza in the beginning of the year
-max to danny's friends- passion of the christ was hilarious(to religious girls) how far can you stick that bannana down your throat (to never been kissed girl) see you later silly (to closet gay guy)
-when i had to take care of danny and jim cause they drank too much and were both puking their brains out
-getting in a fight with a bodyguard in cancun 
-when jim and danny glued the dollar bill to our floor
-megaman, yoshi island, donkey kong, lion king -we ride till we die nigga
-max draining my battery by leaving the door open
-murphy's negotiation of the leather jacket
-delicious coldstone
-danny and jim having girls sleep in their room on the first day
-running a bar out of gerards triple every weekend
-danny's blisters from bball
-danny's yogurt farts
-justin farting on me in public 3 times
-the kids farting and making hilarious comments during the sexual harasment play in orientation
-matt replacing max as bizaro max
-james giving directions to apartments when he had no idea where he was going
-jim eating a whole cup cake in one bite and being sooooooo pissed and storming out
-when the dhall worker asked us for our trays and danny proceeded to take everything off his tray and hand the man only his tray because thats what james led him to do. of course the guy wanted everything on the tray.
-the first time max saw me praying and asked me if i was serious
-gerard hooking up with haley....ewww
-nasty nate saying that he could smoke us in soccer

-getting my walet stolen

-drunk driver driving on the other side of the road and almost killing all of us
-gerard puking when we were talking about eating girls out
-max catching me jerkin it
-max me and jim havin a convo about communism vs. capitalism for 4 hours
-jeff flipping out about the chicken fingers
-when i whipped out my dick and max thought he had a whip out your dick free card and started swingin that shit around
-when murphy sprayed max with febreeze and max chased him down and spanked him in the hallway
-waking baseball brian up and max screaming its saturday night, and then brian sending shrek on him 
-jim overacting over fuzzball and wrestling me when max was the instagator
-gilmore pulling off all the whiteboards
-ryan rolling off the top bunk and missing the bean bags and slamming on the ground and just lying there for 
-jim prophesizing my death by car accident
-jims false promises of cleaning up his pile of uncleanliness and max burying himself in it
-waffle house at 4 oclock in the morning
-jim and i on the long walk to the grapeleaf in the freezing rain

holy shit ... thats all i can remember for now... theres more but these are most of the good ones.
3 more years. how much fun can these years be?

today has been the best day in a long time. haha i was due for it. it started off well last night talkin to my friend costi and watching the coolest mexican movie y tu mama tambien. it continued going even better, i got a 93 on my CORE midterm, watched a movie in sociology, ate a delicious lunch,  took the best nap of life, woke up checked my mail box and recieved a 1,890 dollar scholarship to argentina. HOLLA. then i met with my math teacher, and now im sure im gonna do well on the math test this friday. hell yea bitches. i was so overdue for a good day like this. plus i have nearly no hw today and didnt yesterday. somehow im still ridiculously happy even tho ryan and emma would both rather not talk to me right now. hahaha. its ok theyre both just pmsing. hahaha. cant wait till argentina although i dont know what im gonna do afterwards in july...
oh and the song of the day... heard it while walking to class. i remember when ryan and i were listening to it in barbados... good memories.

Keane- somewhere only we know

well it final happened. i knew i was gonna blow and i did. i fuckin blew a fuse. just too many things have been happening to me too many people think they can push me around. jim just fuckin was the unlucky person that i blew up on. i mean he didnt really do that much and yea i definetly over reacted but its one of those things where you poke me, and just keep poking me until i slam you in the face. (ryan knows what im talking about) it felt good but at the same time now i know i have to go make an awkward apology. oh well ill take it. it was worth it. at least i was able to stop when i did. i dont think i really hurt him but i was definetly going down that path. its weird i really couldnt control what i did. he slapped me in the face much harder then he intended. i know he didnt mean to hit me that hard but at that point it didnt matter something in me just snapped and i was blinded with anger. I guess thats something thats wrong with me.  I should address things before they get out of control. This incident would never have happened if I had just stopped people from taking advantage of me from the beginning. Instead i hold it all in until at one point i explode. that cant be healthy. In the end im glad i have wrestler instincts rather than fighting instincts cause wrestling someone is better than starting to throw punches. all i can say is i predicted this coming, so it came. I apologize to everyone who has to put up with me over reacting but at the same time i hope the people who walk all over me feel like shit. well i feel better now regardless. peace for now.

imagine a scale....

on the left reasons why it cant be

on the right reasons why it should be

the left

i hardly ever get to see her

when i do come up its still hard to see her

ever since october im not sure she even loves me

shes done this 3 times now

we live two completely seperate lives

the feeling in the back of my mind that i should be seeing what else is out there

the right

the feeling i get every time i listen to spanish music

the fact that shes beautiful in every way you can imagine

the way i feel everytime i see her smile, every time she laughs, cries, and yes even whines

the dreamlike feeling i get everytime i kiss her

*i love her...and always will*

 

 

its so hard the scale is so balanced

but if i go back then ive learned nothing... ive gotten no where...

 i cant

no se hizo para que fuera...

this weekends: started out with me and gerard goin to play soccer, and when we got there some of the varsity players were also playing which was sweet because they asked us to play a small sided game with them. they were so sick but gerard and i still scored a goal each. i got back to gray and kerry invited me to chill in her room so jim and i went over and chilled for awhile. i talked to emma she was mad sick and told her not to go skiing(cause im such a great dad). then we all decided to go to a lodge party, but jim and i couldnt get in which sucked ass but its all good. sat i woke up at 2 30 tried to call Will but he wasnt there. its actually kinda funny cause i asked him his number and he gave me the wrong fuckin one at first. haha oh will.  i miss the kid but he said hes comin to spend two weeks with me in may which will kick ass. anyway i called emma who hadnt gone skiing, and then went to play soccer with gerard again, but sadly the varisty team wasnt there this time. after that me and jim headed out to the grape leaf, a mediterranian restaurant(really lebanese) since jim is lebanese, and it was fuckin delicious, only problem was we had to walk all the fuckin way there which is about 3 miles, and ended up being 4 miles cause i took us the longest way possible. but in the end  it was worth it... mmmmm kafta. anyway we got back and headed out to the fiji lodge party which i have to go to cause two of my 3 closest friends, (Max and Dany) are part of the frat. it was alright there but we went to a different lodge (which i snuck into cause i wasnt on the list) and it was crazy in there. the night kinda went downhill from there, jim who i spend a lot of time with now cause dany and max are fuckin ridiculously busy at the frat got real drunk and depressed that he didnt have  a girlfriend and i had to take him back to gray. thi was actually a more difficult task than you might think considering it was freezing rain outside and we basically had to iceskate on our shoes all the way back. being drunk never helps this and i must admit it was hard even being sober. somehow we returned safley and i just passed out right away which is probably bad since jim was so fucked up but hell im tired of being teh sober caretaker. i awoke at 1 30 on sunday to see that i had an email about our core group meeting for 1 30. sadly i didnt get there till 2 30 and they were already finished. hahaha makes up for the other group i was in where i did all the fuckin work. well kerry is in my group and we just chilled in the library talked and studied it was a chill afternoon. finally i realized i hadnt eaten all day and after a  hardy meal decided i had nothing better to do than watch sports center and write in live journal. wow this entry was way to long
EAGLES WIN YEAAAAAAAAAAAA. superbowl baby. first time since 1980. BRING ON THE AFC.

ive got a math quiz now which sucks... i hope i studied enought. i couldnt fall asleep last night im pretty tired i dont think im gonna do too well. i need to party tonight or i think im gonna kill myself. im kinda pissed right now for various reasons but im sure ill get over it. 
i think because im too nice to people they take out their bad moods on me. what the fuck. next time someone does that to me im gonna explode on them. i dont deserve it and im not gonna take it anymore. and this isnt the first time either or else id let it slide.

im back at u of r for my second semester. christmas break was mad fun, i went to barbados, got sunburnt and then spent the last week of break running around trying to see everyone i wanted to see. it was kinda stressful but fun. my new classes are ok, i miss spanish class cause i had a lot of friends in it and i never see any of them anymore. oh well, la vida es una ruida que nunca frena i suppose. its good to see all my friends back at richmond their all doin pretty good cept for dany and max joined a frat which is taking up most of their time. i already miss emma im hoping to see her on valentines day i have somethin good planed for her. aj is comin down to visit me on the weekend of the 29th which will be mad fun. meanwhile i need to get a job, and try to call will or sasha who i havent talked to since this summer. time flies at richmond is all i can say.

well im chillin at home emma came for the weekend and it was mad fun... except for the little "run in" with my dad. oh well shit happens i guess. it was still a great time, we stayed up so late and had a great talk and of course i made her all tired for the next day. we went to philly and it was so cold, but it was fun i got a beckham poster for sunita which im sure shell enjoy. im glad to know that theres still a great connection between emma and i, and i know  if we didnt have to sleep we could talk forever. its so fun being with her again after missing her so much. i cant wait till she gets back from break and we can chill again, but after that im not sure when ill see her again, as i dont have a car or an any breaks for awhile. it makes me sad but for now ill tell myself to live in the moment and enjoy it to its fullest. like always.
siempre mi corazon late por ti
